item.title: Changelog
item.description: About this site Write with static site generator Hugo Uses ecwu-theme from Jan 2022, Theme introduction: TBA Build with GitHub Actions Site preview build with Cloudflare Pages https://ecwu-github-io-source.pages.dev/ Host by GitHub Pages Cloudflare & Qiniu for distributing files Comment Plugin: utterances Site Analytics: Google Analytics v4 Changelog 2022 January 2022 Enable the new ecwu-theme, Written in Tailwind CSS 3 Adding Comment Plugin utterances Adding Site Analytics Google Analytics v4 New Terms, Series View and Pages.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Zhenghao Wu, 伍正豪, Jack, ECWU Education: Postgraduate Student, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, MSc. Big Data Technology Graduated with First-Class Honours, BNU-HKBU UIC, BSc. Computer Science and Technology (Honours) Experience: Application Research Engineer Intern at Tencent Co-founder and member of UICHCC Computer Club Member of UICAISIG Hobbies: Tech, Photography (Analog and Digital), Music Social Media: GitHub: @ecwu Instagram: @ecwuuuuu Bilibili: ecwuuu Google Scholar: Zhenghao Wu
